cause.description:
We want to see our country get better and we sit and do nothing. Get involved and help Rock the Arts. Kids need music, dance, art classes and more to keep them interested in school and out of trouble.
1. School is for learning but should be fun.
2. The more kids are offered the less they wonder in life.
cause.mission: keep kids out of trouble with art programs in school.
cause.name: Rock the Arts
